About

I am a Computer Science PhD candidate at Federal University of Paraná. Also, I am member of the Research Group on Software Engineering (GrES) with focus in Search-Based Software Engineering (SBSE) area.

Research Interests

  • Search-Based Software Engineering
  • Bio-inspired Computing
  • Multi-Objective Optimization
  • Hyper-heuristics
  • Mutation Testing
